name: Hack FPS
description:
This game is currently in development, but there is a beta version available to play.

Hack FPS is a First Person Shooter (obviously). Your objective is to hack enemies and use their abilities to get to the end of the level.

Controls

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look

Space bar: Jump

Left mouse button: Fire

Right mouse button: Hack

Pro Tips
  • Pay attention to the minimap to know where you're landing.
  • You can melee enemies by tackling them or hitting them with crates.
  • Hold two movement keys at once to gain more speed.

The game is free to download for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Please keep in mind this game still in its beta phase, so feedback would be greatly appreciated.

Join the r3sgame Discord for updates on this game.
